file_content.text: Padawan, turn back. Leave this place--leave me. I am dying.
Flesh Raiders in this ruin. More powerful than we've seen.
Master Orgus sent me to drive back the Flesh Raiders.
That's why I'm here.
No. These Flesh Raiders control the Force.
What's your name? How'd you get here?
Who are you?
Laotah. Defender of the Jedi Temple.
The enemy was obviously too much for you.
You're a mess.
Barely escaped. Can't go on with these wounds.
Surveillance monitors picked up Flesh Raiders entering this ruin. Came to investigate. Shouldn't have come alone.
This place--strong in the dark side. Flesh Raiders channel their hatred here, feed on the darkness. They grow powerful.
Powerful or not, there's no one else coming.
Then I have to stop them.
An alien commands the Flesh Raiders. Is he here?
Have you seen their leader?
Don't know. Everything grows dark. Can't see....
Then I'll meet their hatred with my own and kill every last one.
If they can do it, so can I!
No--this is wrong. You don't know what you're doing....
Turn back. The enemy's too strong. They have my lightsaber....
Beware. This ruin is strong with the dark side of the Force.
